attributes.action: Penalize supermarkets,restaurants.food outlets in general for throwing food away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
its horrifing to see  the amount of food being thrown away on  a daily basis by various food outlets


can these places that do so get fines or be penalized in other ways IN LAW?



its not environmently friendly and its morally wrong too

a total waste in whatever way you look at it

why allow this to go on?

there are inumerous ways of disposing of the food other than bining it!

please sign this petition


thank you for your attention
kind regards

Paula
